paper.title: Analysis of Petri Nets by Stepwise Refinements

author.org: Laboratoire d'Automatique et d'Analyse des Systèmes du Centre National de la Recherche Scientifique, 7, avenue du Colonel Roche, 31400 Toulouse, France

paper.venue: Journal of Computer and System Sciences
paper.abstract: If the firing of a transition in a Petri net is considered non instantaneous, it becomes possible to replace a transition in a net B by another net 8’. This allows to proceed the description and the analysis of a control structure by stepwise refinements. The necessar! and sufficient conditions on B and Y’, for the resulting net to be bounded and live, are given.
